title: An Epic, Must-See Takedown (Ep 1671)
description:
An epic takedown of the disastrous Joe Biden presidency that you must see. Also, these coronavirus panic porn propagandists get busted on tv.

News Picks:

Fully vaccinated US Senators come down with COVID.

Big news. Joe Manchin is a “no” on Biden’s Build Back Worse plan.

Elon Musk is about to pay a record-breaking tax bill.

The GOP readies a number of probes if they take back Congress. They’d better follow through. 

Soros operative gets busted supporting child predators.

This teacher’s union representative is clearly lying about her role in closing schools.

Deaths from hurricanes and storms are lower than ever.
